projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Kasirku -  Cashier Management System
projects.bodyText:
- A Cashier Management System made using **Codeigniter**. 
 - Uses **Bootstrap** for UI.
 - Payment gateway integration with **Midtrans**.
 - Uses **jQuery** for AJAX.

projects.title: Sikl App
projects.bodyText:
- Local Shoe Sales Application Based on Android Application.
 - Built with **Kotlin** and **Android Studio**.

projects.title: Absensi Magang
projects.bodyText:
- Internship Attendance Management System Based on Website.
 - Built with PHP, CSS, JS with Laravel Framework and Livewire, Vite, Tailwind CSS Library.

projects.title: Presensi Karyawan
projects.bodyText:
- Internship Attendance Management System Based on Website.
 - Built with PHP, CSS, JS with Laravel Framework and Livewire, Vite, Tailwind CSS Library. 
 - Location detection feature using GPS permission. 
 - PDF report generation feature.

projects.title: Oje ATV - A company that rent ATV for offroad adventure
projects.bodyText:
- Built with Wordpress.
 - Uses **Elementor** for page builder.

projects.title: Diabetes Disease Analysis based on Machine Learning
projects.bodyText:
- Prediction of diabetes disease based on disease history with the Decision Tree algorithm model.
 - Built with Python, and Streamlit for App.
 - Uses **Pandas** and **Numpy** for data manipulation and analysis.
 - Uses **Matplotlib** and **Seaborn** for data visualization.

projects.title: Portal Sekolah SD IT Semesta Cendekia
projects.bodyText:
- Prediction of diabetes disease based on disease history with the Decision Tree algorithm model.
 - Built with Python, and Streamlit for App.
 - Uses **Pandas** and **Numpy** for data manipulation and analysis.
 - Uses **Matplotlib** and **Seaborn** for data visualization.

projects.title: Pariwisata Kaltim
projects.bodyText:
- A website that provides information about tourism in East Kalimantan.
 - Built with PHP, CSS, JS with Laravel Framework and React.js.
